name: Elara Luminas
role: High Priestess of the Elderglow Council
motivation: To safeguard the celestial artifacts and ensure the harmonious flow of magic across Gokia by maintaining the ancient celestial rites.

name: Thalos Veilenshade
motivation: To unify the Veilen tribes against the Harbingers of Ash and deepen their connection to Gokia through the exploration of ancient runes.

name: Zarok Emberclaw
role: Commander of the Harbingers of Ash
motivation: To seize the celestial artifacts and harness Gokiaâ€™s magic in order to establish a new order under his dark dominion.

name: Mira Whisperwind
motivation: To foster unity and peace among Gokia's tribes by promoting dialogue and shared stories in the neutral ground of the Whispering Glade.

name: Orin Riverheart
role: Guardian of the River of Memories
motivation: To protect the River of Memories and its flow of knowledge, ensuring that the wisdom of the past remains accessible to those who seek it with pure intentions.
